item.dc:title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
item.dc:creator: J.K. Rowling
item.dc:subject: Children's Books Novel Paperback ISBN: 0747532748
item.dc:description: Harry Potter receives his Hogwarts acceptance letter. He then embarks on a magical journey, where he makes friends with Ron and Hermione, and they embark on adventures protecting the wizarding world from the dark wizard Lord Voldmort.
